articles.title: Astronomer CEO's ‘kiss cam’ controversy sparked over $7 million in prediction markets bets on his ouster - CNBC
articles.description: The controversy triggered $2.4 million in total trading volumes on Kalshi, marking one of the most traded cultural events on prediction markets.
articles.content:
Astronomer CEO Andy Byron's controversy went so viral that it sparked millions of dollars in bets on prediction markets over his resignation.
